professional_summary: Dynamic and results-driven Quality Assurance Engineer with over 7 years of experience in automation testing for enterprise clients. Expert in architecting Selenium-based frameworks that reduce testing time by 70% and enhance accuracy. Proficient in Java and API testing, with strong skills in integrating CI/CD pipelines and Agile methodologies to deliver high-quality automation solutions.
technical_skills: Automation Frameworks: Selenium WebDriver, Cucumber, TestNG, JUnit, Rest Assured
ETL & Databases: SQL Server, Oracle, PostgreSQL, MongoDB
Networking & Protocols: HTTP/HTTPS, REST, JSON, TCP/IP, DNS
Testing Types: End-To-End UI Functional Testing, Regression Testing, API Testing, Performance Testing, Mobile Testing
CI/CD, DevOps & Cross-Browser: Jenkins, Docker, Kubernetes, GitHub Actions, BrowserStack
Monitoring Tools: Grafana, Datadog, ELK Stack, JMeter

experience.new_line: • Designed and implemented hybrid automation frameworks using Java, Selenium, and TestNG, leading to robust multi-browser test environments and efficient dataset validations.
• Developed cross-browser automation frameworks with Selenium WebDriver and Maven, achieving a 70% reduction in testing time and a notable increase in defect detection precision.
• Enhanced API automation using Java and dynamic helper methods, streamlining RESTful service validations and integrations.
• Mentored a team of QA engineers on test automation best practices and Agile methodologies, boosting script development efficiency by 30%.
• Automated 200+ functional and integration tests using Selenium WebDriver and Java, ensuring comprehensive coverage and system stability.
• Implemented data-driven tests with Selenium, TestNG, and Excel, improving regression test coverage by 30% for 5+ major releases.
• Architected a scalable Selenium testing infrastructure for cross-browser testing, enhancing automation capabilities on diverse environments.
• Created a modular automation framework in Java, automating 80% of manual test cases and significantly saving time.

rewrite_packet.notes: Enhanced focus on Selenium and Java automation. Integrated database and API testing according to the JD's requirements.
